name: FMLHandshakeClientState
description: Packet handshake sequence manager- client side (responding to remote server) Flow: 1. Wait for server hello. (START). Move to HELLO state. 2. Receive Server Hello. Send customchannel registration. Send Client Hello. Send our modlist. Move to WAITINGFORSERVERDATA state. 3. Receive server modlist. Send ack if acceptable, else send nack and exit error. Receive server IDs. Move to COMPLETE state. Send ack.
